testcase.classname: Smoke test to make sure bundled product page is working
testcase.name: Configuring child product of bundled product
testcase.system-out: Given I am on a bundled product page........................................passed And the child product of the bundled product is configurable................passed When I configure the child product to my liking.............................passed Then price as configured and availability should update accordingly.........passed

testcase.classname: Smoke test to make sure bundled product page is working
testcase.name: Adding bundled product to cart
testcase.system-out: Given I am on a bundled product page........................................passed And my configuration of the bundled product is in stock.....................passed When I click the Add to Cart button.........................................passed Then product should be added to my cart.....................................passed And a page notification should be displayed saying product successfully added to cart.passed

testcase.system-out: Given I am on the homepage..................................................passed When I select a category with static content from the main navigation.......passed Then I should be directed to that category page.............................passed

testcase.system-out: Given I am on the homepage..................................................passed When I select a category with product from the main navigation..............passed Then I should be directed to that category page.............................passed And the category page should have product on it.............................passed

testcase.name: Navigating to Product detail page from Category page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the homepage..................................................passed Given that I am on a category page with product.............................passed When I select a product Image/Name..........................................passed Then I should be directed to that product’s detail page.....................passed

testcase.classname: Smoke testing to make sure a basic category page works
testcase.name: Adding simple product to cart on category page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the homepage..................................................passed Given that I am on a category page with product.............................passed And there is simple product on the page.....................................passed When I click the add to cart button.........................................passed Then Product is added to cart...............................................passed And page notification displays saying product was added to cart.............passed

testcase.classname: Smoke test to make sure home logo is working
testcase.name: Clicking company logo image
testcase.system-out: Given I am on any page on the site..........................................passed When I click the company logo...............................................passed Then I am taken to site homepage............................................passed

testcase.classname: Smoketest to make sure compare function is working
testcase.name: Adding product to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given Compare function is enabled...........................................passed Given I am logged in........................................................passed And I am on product detail page.............................................passed When I click on the Add to Compare link.....................................passed Then a page notification should be displayed saying product was added to comparison list.passed And that product should be added to comparison list.........................passed

testcase.classname: Smoketest to make sure compare function is working
testcase.name: Viewing comparison list
testcase.system-out: Given Compare function is enabled...........................................passed Given I am logged in........................................................passed And I am on a category page.................................................passed And I have product in my comparison list....................................passed When I click the compare button.............................................passed Then Comparison page should be displayed with products in my comparison list.passed

testcase.classname: Smoketest to make sure compare function is working
testcase.name: Removing product from compare list
testcase.system-out: Given Compare function is enabled...........................................passed Given I am logged in........................................................passed And I want to remove product................................................passed When I click on the Clear All link under compare products section...........passed Then All products are removed from compare section..........................passed

testcase.classname: Smoke testing to make sure configurable product page works
testcase.name: I am on a configurable product page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on a configurable product page...................................passed Then product name, price, and availability should be displayed..............passed

testcase.classname: Smoke testing to make sure configurable product page works
testcase.name: Configurable product is in stock
testcase.system-out: Given I am on a configurable product page...................................passed And the product is in stock.................................................passed Then Add to Cart button should be displayed.................................passed And editable quantity field should be displayed.............................passed

testcase.classname: Smoke testing to make sure configurable product page works
testcase.name: Adding configurable product to cart
testcase.system-out: Given I am on a configurable product page...................................passed And configuration of configurable product is in stock.......................passed When I click the Add to Cart button.........................................passed Then product should be added to my cart.....................................passed And a page notification should be displayed saying product successfully added to cart.passed

testcase.name: Product does not have reviews
